title: Boho Green Grey Stripe Throw Pillow Covers 18x18 Inch Set of 2, Rustic Abstract Decorative Throw Pillow Covers Retro Stripe Linen Outdoor Cushion Cover for Sofa Couch Farmhouse Room Bed Decor
description: We combine modern aesthetic with classic elements to design warm and elegant patterns for Boho, so that the pillow case perfectly into your home environment, become the highlight of the furniture. These patterns are soft in color and not harsh, adding a touch of warmth and elegance to your home space. Product Attribute Size: 18"x18"(45cm X 45cm) Material: Linen blend, Linen fabric is durable and wear-resistant. This pillow case after special processing, the fabric is more tough and durable, not easy to pilling, not easy to fade. Even after a long time of use and washing, it can still maintain the same texture and beauty. It is not only your intimate companion in home life, but also a symbol of your pursuit of quality life. Invisible zipper：From the exquisite wrapping process to the solid invisible zipper design, every place reveals our persistence and pursuit of quality. The zipper is smooth and easy to pull, which is convenient to replace the pillow core without affecting the overall beauty. Easy to clean: The fabric of the rustic green amd grey stripe Decorative throw pillow is easy to clean and can even be washed directly in the washing machine. This means that even if it is accidentally stained in daily use, it can be easily restored to its cleanliness and beauty. Boho Room Decor: The boho antique retro stripe coshion case has printed on one side only, the pattern is clear and the color does not fade. It can create a good holiday atmosphere for your living room, bedroom, office, etc. Practical functions: Throw pillows can not only be used as home decoration, but also have practical functions. It can be used as a backrest support, so that you sit more comfortably on the sofa; It can also be used as a hold to make you feel warmer and more intimate while watching TV or reading. Cleaning Suggestions: Machine wash cold separately, delicate cycle, can be recycled many times after washing, and cannot be bleached.
